EncodedVideoChunk.summary: The EncodedVideoChunk interface of the represents a chunk of encoded video data.

EncodedVideoChunkByteLength.summary: The byteLength read-only property of the interface returns the length in bytes of the encoded video data.

EncodedVideoChunkEncodedVideoChunk.summary: The EncodedVideoChunk() constructor creates a new object representing a chunk of encoded video.

EncodedVideoChunkCopyTo.summary: The copyTo() method of the interface copies the encoded chunk of video data.

EncodedVideoChunkDuration.summary: The duration read-only property of the interface returns an integer indicating the duration of the video in microseconds.

EncodedVideoChunkType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface returns a value indicating whether the video chunk is a key chunk, which does not rely on other frames for decoding.

EncodedVideoChunkTimestamp.summary: The timestamp read-only property of the interface returns an integer indicating the timestamp of the video in microseconds.
